query.name: Header
query.script: select 'за период с '|| case ${repmonth}::integer when 1 then '€нвар€' when 2 then 'феврал€' when 3 then 'марта' when 4 then 'апрел€' when 5 then 'ма€' when 6 then 'июн€' when 7 then 'июл€' when 8 then 'августа' when 9 then 'сент€бр€' when 10 then 'окт€бр€' when 11 then 'но€бр€' when 12 then 'декабр€' end ||' по '|| case ${repmonthby}::integer when 1 then '€нварь' when 2 then 'февраль' when 3 then 'март' when 4 then 'апрель' when 5 then 'май' when 6 then 'июнь' when 7 then 'июль' when 8 then 'август' when 9 then 'сент€брь' when 10 then 'окт€брь' when 11 then 'но€брь' when 12 then 'декабрь' end ||' '||${repyear}::text||' года' as DATEREPORT

query.name: spec
query.script: select 'ќбщий итог:' as FED, (select count(DISTINCT x.benefitsrecipientsid) from benefit03 x, benefitspackets xx where xx.id = x.benefitspacketsid and xx.repmonth::integer between ${repmonth}::integer and ${repmonthby}::integer and xx.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER) AS POL, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFIT03PAYMENT p WHERE B.ID = P.benefit03id)),0) AS PAY from subjectsdir r left JOIN BENEFITSPACKETS Z ON r.id = Z.subjectsdirid and (SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) between ${repmonth}::integer and ${repmonthby}::integer and z.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER left join BENEFIT03 B on b.benefitspacketsid = z.id;

query.name: spec2
query.script: select r.name as FED, (select count(DISTINCT x.benefitsrecipientsid) from benefit03 x, benefitspackets xx where xx.id = x.benefitspacketsid and xx.repmonth::integer between ${repmonth}::integer and ${repmonthby}::integer and xx.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER) AS POL, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFIT03PAYMENT p WHERE B.ID = P.benefit03id)),0) AS PAY from subjectsdir r left JOIN BENEFITSPACKETS Z ON r.id = Z.subjectsdirid and (SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) between ${repmonth}::integer and ${repmonthby}::integer and z.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER left join BENEFIT03 B on b.benefitspacketsid = z.id where r.fedreg = ${spec1.FED} group by r.name;

query.name: spec1
query.script: select r.fedreg as FED, (select count(DISTINCT x.benefitsrecipientsid) from benefit03 x, benefitspackets xx where xx.id = x.benefitspacketsid and xx.repmonth::integer between ${repmonth}::integer and ${repmonthby}::integer and xx.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER) AS POL, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFIT03PAYMENT p WHERE B.ID = P.benefit03id)),0) AS PAY from subjectsdir r left JOIN BENEFITSPACKETS Z ON r.id = Z.subjectsdirid and (SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) between ${repmonth}::integer and ${repmonthby}::integer and z.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER left join BENEFIT03 B on b.benefitspacketsid = z.id GROUP BY R.fedreg;
